Catalyst uses **DNA Keycards** mod from the workshop.
- **Total of 5 different keycard rooms.**
- Each keycard room is color coded with loot varying depending on the color.
- Red Strongrooms (not red crates) contain 1 catalyst coin, catalyst coins are used to purchase the best gear on the server.
- Once a keycard is used, it will become defective and useless.
```fix
- KEYCARD SYSTEM -```
**[ LIST OF THE COLORS/ TIERS ]**
Red - `Tier 5+`
Purple - `Tier 4`
Blue - `Tier 3`
Yellow - `Tier 3`
Green - `Tier 2`
Mixed - `Combination of different keycard colors Green through Red`
- __Red__ and __Purple__ keycards are considered mostly *military loot* and other *higher tier raiding/base building items*.
- __Blue__, __Yellow__ and __Green__ contain a mixture of tier 3 loot but also contain *raid/building materials* and *other items* - so you shouldn't skip out on these colors either.
**[ SPAWN LOCATIONS OF KEYCARDS ]**
- __Green__, __Yellow__, __Blue__ and __Purple__ keycards spawn in military locations.

- __Red__ keycards will only spawn at the **custom research facilities**. Beware, these *research bunkers are exposed to radiation* so you will need a gas mask and don't forget to bring lots of filters!
*- Keep an eye out for the plane wreck crashes, they contain more loot and have a chance for red keycards.*
There are also ||hidden areas around military areas||. You will have to go out and find them! They will contain treasures inside!
Whenever you open a keycard __strongroom__ or __crate__, **all players** within __2000m__ will be **alerted**.
